modelIdentification.name: NETN-ORG
modelIdentification.purpose: Produce a Organisation definition (MSDL style) in a HLA Federation Execution
modelIdentification.useHistory: v1.0.0 - the first release of the FOM module.

poc.pocName: MSG-163 Evolution of NATO Standards for Federated Simulation

modelIdentification.other:

Above license gives you the right to use and redistribute the NETN FOM Module (XML file and Documentation) in its entirety without modification. You are also allowed to develop your own new FOM Modules (in separate XML files and separate documentation) that build-on/extends the NETN module by reference. You are NOT allowed to modify the NETN FOM Module or its documentation without prior permission by the NATO Modelling and Simulation Group.

objectClass.name: ORG_Root
objectClass.semantics: Root object class for all NETN-ORG object classes. Includes unique identifier and unique name attributes inherited by all subclasses.

attribute.name: UniqueId
attribute.semantics: Required. Unique Identifier.

objectClass.name: Unit
objectClass.semantics: Representation of an organizational unit based on attributes defined in the NETN-ORG extensions of MSDL.

attribute.name: Name
attribute.semantics: Required. A unique name of the unit.

attribute.name: SuperiorUnit
attribute.semantics: Required. Reference to the superior unit. If this unit has no superior unit (i.e. is the top-unit) then the value of this attribute shall be 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 (UUID with all zeros).

attribute.name: EmbarkedIn
attribute.semantics: Optional. A reference to a unit or equipment item which is carrying/transporting the unit. Default value is 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 (UUID with all zeros) indicating that the unit is not embarked in or mounted on any other unit or equipment.

attribute.name: Force
attribute.semantics: Optional. A reference to the Force that the unit belongs to. A missing value is interpreted as the force being unknown/undetermined.

attribute.name: Holdings
attribute.semantics: Optional. A set of holdings of the unit. Default is an empty list.

attribute.name: EntityType
attribute.semantics: Required. The entity type to use for representation of the unit as an aggregate entity. Entity types should be based on SISO-REF-010 and/or defined by federation agreements.

attribute.name: SymbolId
attribute.semantics: Required. A symbol identifier represented as a string.

attribute.name: SymbolAmplification
attribute.semantics: Optional. Text amplifications for the unit's symbol. Static or very low update rate.

attribute.name: Disposition
attribute.semantics: Required. Detailed positional information on unit.

attribute.name: Formation
attribute.semantics: Optional. Formation of this unit.

attribute.name: IsHq
attribute.semantics: Optional. Indicate whether the unit has a command function, e.g. if it is an HQ or not.

attribute.name: Echelon
attribute.semantics: Optional. Symbol modifier identifying the command level. Default NONE.

attribute.name: CommunicationNetworks
attribute.semantics: Optional. Set of Communication Networks that the unit monitors and uses to communicate during a mission.

objectClass.name: EquipmentItem
objectClass.semantics: Representation of an equipment item based on attributes defined in the NETN-ORG extensions of MSDL.

attribute.name: Name
attribute.semantics: Required. A unique name of the equipment item.

attribute.name: HoldingUnit
attribute.semantics: Required. Identifies the lowest level unit in the ORBAT to which this equipment item belongs.

attribute.name: MountedOn
attribute.semantics: Optional. Reference to another equipment item on which this item is mounted or attached.

attribute.name: EntityType
attribute.semantics: Required. SISO-REF-010 code for entity type definitions. If unknown, use 0.0.0.0.0.0.0.

attribute.name: NatoStockNumber
attribute.semantics: Optional. NATO stock number code. 13 digits (0-9)

attribute.name: SymbolId
attribute.semantics: Required. A symbol identifier represented as a string.

attribute.name: SymbolAmplification
attribute.semantics: Optional. Text amplifications for the equipment's symbol. Static or very low update rate.

attribute.name: Disposition
attribute.semantics: Required. Detailed positional information on equipment item.

attribute.name: CommunicationNetworks
attribute.semantics: Optional. Set of Communication Networks that the equipment monitors and uses to communicate during a mission.

attribute.name: Resolution
attribute.semantics: Optional. Enumeration indicating the level of fidelity appropriate for instancing the equipment in the simulation. Default value: NOT_SPECIFIED.

objectClass.name: Installation
objectClass.semantics: Representation of an installation/facility based on attributes defined in the NETN-ORG extensions of MSDL.

attribute.name: Name
attribute.semantics: Required. A unique name of the installation.

attribute.name: Owner
attribute.semantics: Required. Reference to the force, unit or equipment item owning or hosting the installation.

attribute.name: EntityType
attribute.semantics: Required. SISO-REF-010 code for entity type definitions. If unknown, use 0.0.0.0.0.0.0.

attribute.name: SymbolId
attribute.semantics: Required. A symbol identifier represented as a string.

attribute.name: SymbolAmplification
attribute.semantics: Optional. Text amplifications for the installation's symbol. Static or very low update rate.

attribute.name: Location
attribute.semantics: Required. Geographic location of the installation.

objectClass.name: Force
objectClass.semantics: Representation of a specific force and its relationship with other forces. Units belonging to a force all have the same relationship with units belonging to another force. The relationships between forces can be asymmetrical, e.g. Force A can be hostile to B while B is neutral to A. The relation may change during a federation execution.

attribute.name: Name
attribute.semantics: Required. Name of the force/side.

attribute.name: Relations
attribute.semantics: Optional. Sequence of relations, force-relation. Default is an empty array.

objectClass.name: FederateApplication
objectClass.semantics: Representation of the allocation of initial modelling responsibility of units and equipment items to a federate application.

attribute.name: Name
attribute.semantics: Required. A unique name in the organization to group units and equipment items. This group name is used to determine the initial allocation of modelling responsibility of units and equipment items to a federate. The federation agreements should specify how this name is to be interpreted and how the allocation will be performed. A common agreement and practice are to use the federate name as group name, i.e. the units and equipment items are allocated to the federate with that name. Typically one application will be responsible for performing the allocation. Alternatives for the group name are for example: federate type name, a functional name.

attribute.name: Units
attribute.semantics: Optional. The units for which the federate has the responsibility of simulating. Default is an empty list.

attribute.name: EquipmentItems
attribute.semantics: Optional. The equipment for which the federate has the responsibility of simulating. Default is an empty list.

attribute.name: Installations
attribute.semantics: Optional. The installations for which the federate has the responsibility of simulating. Default is an empty list.

enumeratedData.name: HostilityStatusCodeEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: The specific value that represents the perceived hostility status.

enumeratedData.name: FormationLocationTypeEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: Enumerated choice for the method used to correlate formation to location as center of mass or lead element.

enumeratedData.name: FormationTypeEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: Enumerated choice for the type of formation being Ground, Air, Surface or Subsurface.

enumeratedData.name: ModelResolutionTypeEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: Enumeration indicating the level of fidelity appropriate for instancing the unit or equipment in the simulation.

enumeratedData.name: CommunicationServiceTypeEnum32
enumeratedData.semantics: List of Communications Net Types for Army Units.

fixedRecordData.name: Relation
fixedRecordData.semantics: The specific value that represents the perceived hostility status.

field.name: Affiliate
field.semantics: The force that the current force has a relation to

field.name: Relationship
field.semantics: The level of the relation

fixedRecordData.name: Holding
fixedRecordData.semantics: Static and dynamic data about the holding.

field.name: OperationalCount
field.semantics: The number of specific OBJECT-TYPEs a specific OBJECT-ITEM has available for operations

field.name: OnHandQuantity
field.semantics: Current number of the holding.

field.name: RequiredOnHandQuantity
field.semantics: The required number of the holding.

field.name: IsEquipment
field.semantics: True if is equipment, false for expendables.

field.name: EntityType
field.semantics: DIS enumeration. Use 0.0.0.0.0.0.0 when not defined.

field.name: NSNcode
field.semantics: 13 digits (0-9)

field.name: NSNname
field.semantics: Nato Stock Number

fixedRecordData.name: FormationPositionStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: The position of this unit/eqiupment in the higher unit formation.

field.name: OutOfFormation
field.semantics: Identifies if the element is maneuvering independently from the higher unit's formation.

field.name: FormationOrder
field.semantics: The placement, 1 to N, of a subordinate in the superior unit formation.

field.name: SensorOrientation
field.semantics: Orientation of the main sensor, sights, and weapon in compass degrees relative to orientation of the platform (equipment).

field.name: FormationLocationType
field.semantics: The method used to correlate formation to location as center of mass or lead element.

field.name: FormationSpacing
field.semantics: The default spacing in metres between subordinate elements one echelon below.

field.name: FormationOrientation
field.semantics: Orientation in compass degrees for unit formations and equipment.

field.name: FormationData
field.semantics: The formation data specific to the specified formation type.

fixedRecordData.name: CommunicationNetworkStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: CommunicationNetInstance that equipment monitors or uses to communicate with a mission.

field.name: Service
field.semantics: Required. The type of service being used for communication.

field.name: Owner
field.semantics: UUID reference to the Unit that owns a particular item of data as part of that unit's organization.

field.name: NetworkName
field.semantics: Name of the Communication network.

field.name: ReinforcedOrReduced
field.semantics: A text amplifier in a unit symbol that displays (+) for reinforced, (-) for reduced, (Â±) reinforced and reduced.

field.name: StaffComments
field.semantics: A text amplifier for units, equipment and installations.

field.name: AdditionalInformation
field.semantics: A text amplifier for units, equipment and installations.

field.name: EvaluationRating
field.semantics:
A text amplifier for units, equipment and installations that consists of a one-letter reliability rating and a one-number credibility rating.
Reliability Ratings: A-completely reliable B-usually reliable C-fairly reliable D-not usually reliable E-unreliable F-reliability cannot be judged
Credibility Ratings: 1-confirmed by other sources 2-probably true 3-possibly true 4-doubtfully true 5-improbable 6-truth cannot be judged.

field.name: CombatEffectiveness
field.semantics: A text amplifier for units and installations that indicates unit effectiveness or installation capability.

field.name: HigherFormation
field.semantics: A text amplifier for units that indicates number or title of higher echelon command (corps are designated by Roman numerals).

field.name: IFF_SIF_AIS
field.semantics: A text amplifier displaying IFF/SIF/AIS identification modes and codes.

field.name: UniqueDesignation
field.semantics: A text amplifier for units, equipment and installations that uniquely identifies a particular symbol or track number. Identifies acquisitions number when used with SIGINT symbology.

field.name: SpecialHeadquarters
field.semantics: A text modifier for a unit's special C2 Headquarters.

field.name: EngagementBarText
field.semantics: A text amplifier placed immediately atop the symbol in the engagement bar. May denote, 1) local/remote status; 2) engagement status; and 3) weapon type.

field.name: Quantity
field.semantics: A text amplifier in an equipment symbol that identifies the number of items present.

field.name: StaffComments
field.semantics: A text amplifier for units, equipment and installations.

field.name: AdditionalInformation
field.semantics: A text amplifier for units, equipment and installations.

field.name: EvaluationRating
field.semantics:
A text amplifier for units, equipment and installations that consists of a one-letter reliability rating and a one-number credibility rating.
Reliability Ratings: A-completely reliable B-usually reliable C-fairly reliable D-not usually reliable E-unreliable F-reliability cannot be judged
Credibility Ratings: 1-confirmed by other sources 2-probably true 3-possibly true 4-doubtfully true 5-improbable 6-truth cannot be judged.

field.name: SignatureEquipment
field.semantics: A text amplifier for hostile equipment; â!â indicates detectable electronic signatures.

field.name: Hostile
field.semantics: A text amplifier for equipment; letters "ENY" denote hostile symbols.

field.name: IFF_SIF_AIS
field.semantics: A text amplifier displaying IFF/SIF/AIS identification modes and codes.

field.name: UniqueDesignation
field.semantics: A text amplifier for units, equipment and installations that uniquely identifies a particular symbol or track number. Identifies acquisitions number when used with SIGINT symbology.

field.name: EquipmentType
field.semantics: A text amplifier for equipment that indicates types of equipment.

field.name: EngagementBarText
field.semantics: A text amplifier placed immediately atop the symbol in the engagement bar. May denote, 1) local/remote status; 2) engagement status; and 3) weapon type.

fixedRecordData.name: DispositionStruct
fixedRecordData.semantics: Positioning of unit or equipment item.

field.name: Location
field.semantics: Geodetic location.

field.name: DirectionOfMovement
field.semantics: Direction of movement.

field.name: Speed
field.semantics: Speed of movement.

field.name: FormationPosition
field.semantics: The position of this unit/eqiupment in the higher unit formation.

field.name: StaffComments
field.semantics: A text amplifier for units, equipment and installations.

field.name: AdditionalInformation
field.semantics: A text amplifier for units, equipment and installations.

field.name: EvaluationRating
field.semantics:
A text amplifier for units, equipment and installations that consists of a one-letter reliability rating and a one-number credibility rating.
Reliability Ratings: A-completely reliable B-usually reliable C-fairly reliable D-not usually reliable E-unreliable F-reliability cannot be judged
Credibility Ratings: 1-confirmed by other sources 2-probably true 3-possibly true 4-doubtfully true 5-improbable 6-truth cannot be judged.

field.name: CombatEffectiveness
field.semantics: A text amplifier for units and installations that indicates unit effectiveness or installation capability.

field.name: IFF_SIF_AIS
field.semantics: A text amplifier displaying IFF/SIF/AIS identification modes and codes.

field.name: UniqueDesignation
field.semantics: A text amplifier for units, equipment and installations that uniquely identifies a particular symbol or track number. Identifies acquisitions number when used with SIGINT symbology.

field.name: EngagementBarText
field.semantics: A text amplifier placed immediately atop the symbol in the engagement bar. May denote, 1) local/remote status; 2) engagement status; and 3) weapon type.

variantRecordData.name: FormationDataStruct
variantRecordData.semantics: Struct for enumerated choice for the type of formation being Ground, Air, Surface or Subsurface.
